rules.natural: Provided that the alcohol rehabilitation program treats alcoholism, the patient is recovered.
If the patient learns a coping skill, then either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication.
Provided that the patient is hospitalized, the patient overdoses.
The patient is compliant, or the patient is discharged, or under the condition that the patient relapses, the patient is hospitalized.
If the patient quits the program, then it is not the case that the patient is compliant.
Either the patient quits the program or the patient is suspended.
In the event that the patient is suspended, the patient is not compliant.
Under the condition that the patient is monitored, it is not the case that the patient is cured.
Whenever the patient enrolls in the alcohol rehabilitation program, the alcohol rehabilitation program treats alcoholism.
Either the patient enrolls in the alcohol rehabilitation program or the doctor refers the alcohol rehabilitation program.
Either the patient has an emergency, or if the patient is not monitored, then the physician is alerted.
Either the patient reports progress or the caregiver reports progress.
If the caregiver reports progress, then under the condition that the patient uses a web portal, either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication.
If the physician reviews the case, then whenever the patient is critical, the patient is not stable.
Either a specialist is consulted or the physician reviews the case.

Either records are updated, or if the system warns the physician, then under the condition that it is not the case that if the patient acquires a life skill, then either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, the patient is not independent.
Provided that the system locks the account, records are not updated.

rules.prover9_expression: (maintains(system, security) | (-(accesses(patient, platform) -> (completes(patient, therapy) | completes(patient, medication))) -> restricted(access)))

Whenever data is analyzed, the system detects an anomaly.
In the event that the patient completes therapy, alcoholism develops into liver disease.
Under the condition that the algorithm processes, the AI detects an anomaly.

Provided that it is not the case that if the patient acquires a life skill, then either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, the patient is independent.

In the event that it is not the case that either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, access is blocked.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the patient accesses the platform, then either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, access is not restricted.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(reports(patient, progress) -> (uses(patient, web_portal) -> (completes(patient, therapy) | completes(patient, medication)))) -> contacts(physician, patient)) -> stable(patient))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the patient reports progress, then under the condition that the patient uses a web portal, either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, then the physician contacts the patient, then the patient is stable.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(reports(patient, progress) -> (uses(patient, web_portal) -> (completes(patient, therapy) | completes(patient, medication)))) -> contacts(physician, patient)) -> critical(patient))

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(-(uses(patient, web_portal) -> (completes(patient, therapy) | completes(patient, medication))) -> investigates(admin)) -> resolves(issue)) -> compromised(system))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the patient uses a web portal, then either the patient completes therapy or the patient completes medication, then an admin investigates, then the issue is resolved, then the system is compromised.
Under the condition that the patient is not recovered, the patient relapses.
Whenever the patient is not recovered, the patient is cured.
